response.overview: Featuring and inspired by Karl Hirzer's track Daphne and Desmond, off his new album Relaxer Distractor, In Tandem is a love letter to the meaningful spaces between two cities, where Hirzer found sources of inspiration, nostalgia and the feeling of home.  As both a pianist and conductor, Hirzer’s hands play an integral part in his artistic practice. This film captures his hands performing mundane activities in his daily life, while documenting the memories and spaces he’s leaving behind, becoming an intimate portrait of the artist at a transitional moment in his life.
response.title: In Tandem (Daphne and Desmond)
